Bellra:
Hello, my name is Bellra. I help heroes access instance zones. I can help you get to Tauti, Frintezza, Octavis and Antharas. Only a command channel leader can submit the request to enter the instance zone. The channel has to include 21-35 characters who have reached Lv. 107. Instance Zone counter is reset at 6:30 a.m. every Saturday. Keep that in mind.
